TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FtpWebResponse extends System.Net.WebResponse

summary.span: 封装文件传输协议 (FTP) 服务器对请求的响应。

span.span: Encapsulates a File Transfer Protocol (FTP) server's response to a request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的实例是通过调用方法获取的。Instances of are obtained by calling the method. 返回的对象必须强制转换为。The returned object must be cast to an . 当应用程序不再需要对象时, 请调用方法以释放由占用的资源。When your application no longer needs the object, call the method to free the resources held by the . 属性包含服务器返回的状态代码, 属性返回状态代码和描述状态的消息。 The property contains the status code returned by the server, and the property returns the status code and a message that describes the status. 这些属性返回的值随服务器返回的消息而更改。The values returned by these properties change as the messages are returned by the server. 请求返回的任何数据 (如为请求返回的文件名列表) 都可用于方法返回的流中。Any data returned by the request, such as the list of file names returned for a request, is available in the stream returned by the method. 可以从属性获取流数据的长度。The length of the stream data can be obtained from the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将发送一个请求, 以删除 FTP 服务器上的文件, 并显示服务器对请求的响应中的状态消息。The following code example sends a request to delete a file on an FTP server and displays the status message from the server's response to the request. 有关其他示例, 请参见和类的成员。For additional examples, see the members of the and classes. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#4)]

public: property System::String ^ BannerMessage { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在登录前建立连接时 FTP 服务器发送的消息。

span.span: Gets the message sent by the FTP server when a connection is established prior to logon.

value.span: ，它包含服务器发送的标语消息；如果没有发送任何消息，则为 。

span.span: A that contains the banner message sent by the server; otherwise, if no message is sent.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclFtpClient#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NclFtpClient#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 释放响应所持有的资源。

span.span: Frees the resources held by the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性为`false`, 则方法将关闭由方法返回的数据流。 The method closes the data stream returned by the method if the property is `false`. 在关闭过程中, 可能会将数据发送到控件连接上的服务器。During the close, data might be sent to the server on the control connection. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例从服务器下载数据, 从响应流中读取数据, 然后将其关闭。The following code example downloads data from a server, reads the data from the response stream, and then closes it. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ContentLength As Long
public: virtual property long ContentLength { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取从 FTP 服务器上接收的数据的长度。

span.span: Gets the length of the data received from the FTP server.

value.span: 值，它包含从 FTP 服务器上接收的数据的字节数。

span.span: An value that contains the number of bytes of data received from the FTP server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 FTP 服务器返回响应流时, 属性包含流中的字节数。When a response stream is returned by the FTP server, the property contains the number of bytes in the stream. 如果在响应中未返回任何数据, 或者服务器未发送内容长度信息, 则返回−1。 returns −1 if no data was returned in the response or if the server did not send content length information. 如果数据为或应该已经返回, 则返回值大于或等于零。The return value is greater than or equal to zero if data was or should have been returned. 例如, 对于使用字段的请求 , 属性始终返回−1。For example, for requests that use the field, the property always returns −1. 对于使用方法的请求, 该属性始终为零。For requests that use the method, the property is always zero. 对于使用方法的请求, 如果下载的文件包含数据, 则属性大于零, 如果为空, 则为零。For requests that use the method, the property is greater than zero if the downloaded file contained data and is zero if it was empty. 对于使用方法的请求, 将返回服务器上指定文件的大小。For requests that use the method, returns the size of the specified file on the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从指定的 FTP 服务器上下载文件。The following code example downloads a file from on the specified FTP server. 此属性包含下载的文件中的字节数。This property contains the number of bytes in the downloaded file. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#9)]

public: virtual property System::String ^ ContentType { System::String ^ get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property ExitMessage As String
public: property System::String ^ ExitMessage { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取 FTP 会话结束时服务器发送的消息。

span.span: Gets the message sent by the server when the FTP session is ending.

value.span: ，它包含服务器发送的退出消息；如果没有发送任何消息，则为 。

span.span: A that contains the exit message sent by the server; otherwise, if no message is sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 直到关闭或重复使用到服务器的连接时, 属性才可用。The property is not available until the connection to the server is closed or reused. 如果属性为`true`, 则此请求使用的连接不会关闭, 这会阻止服务器发送退出消息。 If the property is `true`, the connection used by this request is not closed, which prevents the server from sending an exit message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclFtpClient#17](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#17)] [!code-csharp[NclFtpClient#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.IO.Stream GetResponseStream() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetResponseStream () As Stream

summary.span: 检索包含从 FTP 服务器上发送的响应数据的流。

span.span: Retrieves the stream that contains response data sent from an FTP server.

returns.span: 可读取的 实例，它包含与响应一起返回的数据；如果服务器未返回任何响应数据，则为 。

span.span: A readable instance that contains data returned with the response; otherwise, if no response data was returned by the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 读取数据后, 必须关闭流。After reading the data, you must close the stream. 关闭包含流的对象时, 会自动关闭流。The stream is automatically closed when you close the object that contains it. 引发异常, 除非请求方法为或。 An exception is thrown unless the request method is or . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取请求的响应流。The following code example demonstrates getting the response stream for a request. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#1)]

span.span: The response did not return a data stream.

span.span: Gets an empty object.
An empty object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供属性只是为了与和类的其他实现兼容。 The property is provided only for compatibility with other implementations of the and classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastModified As DateTime
public: property DateTime LastModified { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取 FTP 服务器上的文件的上次修改日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the date and time that a file on an FTP server was last modified.

value.span: ，它包含文件的上次修改日期和时间。

span.span: A that contains the last modified date and time for a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回方法请求的数据。 The property returns the data requested by the method. 对于使用任何其他方法发送的请求 , 将返回。For requests sent using any other method, returns . ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了上次修改 FTP 服务器上的文件的日期和时间。The following code example displays the date and time that a file on an FTP server was last modified. [!code-cpp[NclFtpClient#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[NclFtpClient#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#21)]

public: virtual property Uri ^ ResponseUri { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对请求发送响应的 URI。

span.span: Gets the URI that sent the response to the request.

value.span: 实例，它标识与此响应关联的资源。

span.span: A instance that identifies the resource associated with this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于服务器和特定于资源的行为 (如重定向), 属性返回的值并不总是与属性返回的值相同。Because of server- and resource-specific behaviors, such as redirection, the value returned by the property is not always the same as the value returned by the property. 对于使用方法的请求, 将返回服务器上的文件的名称。For requests that use the method, returns the name of the file on the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StatusCode As FtpStatusCode
public: property System::Net::FtpStatusCode StatusCode { System::Net::FtpStatusCode get(); };

summary.span: 获取从 FTP 服务器上发送的最新状态代码。

span.span: Gets the most recent status code sent from the FTP server.

value.span: 值，它指示与此响应一起返回的最新状态代码。

span.span: An value that indicates the most recent status code returned with this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的值包含在属性中。The value returned by the property is included in the property. 下载数据时, FTP 服务器返回作为状态代码更改的值。When you are downloading data, the value of changes as status codes are returned by the FTP server. 调用方法后, 将包含中间状态代码。After you call the method, contains an intermediate status code. 当调用方法时, 将包含最终状态。When you call the method, contains the final status. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将文件上传到服务器并显示状态。The following code example uploads a file to a server and displays the status. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#2)]

public: property System::String ^ StatusDescription { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取描述从 FTP 服务器发送的状态代码的文本。

span.span: Gets text that describes a status code sent from the FTP server.

value.span: 实例，它包含状态代码以及与此响应一起返回的消息。

span.span: A instance that contains the status code and message returned with this response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由属性返回的文本包括三位数属性值。The text returned by the property includes the 3-digit property value. 下载数据时, FTP 服务器返回更改为状态代码的值。When downloading data, the value of changes as status codes are returned by the FTP server. 调用方法后, 将包含中间状态代码。After you call the method, contains an intermediate status code. 当调用方法时, 将包含最终状态。When you call the method, contains the final status. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将发送一个请求, 以删除 FTP 服务器上的文件, 并显示服务器对请求的响应中的状态消息。The following code example sends a request to delete a file on an FTP server and displays the status message from the server's response to the request. [!code-cpp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLFtpClient#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#4)]

summary.span: 获取身份验证完成时 FTP 服务器发送的消息。

span.span: Gets the message sent by the FTP server when authentication is complete.

value.span: ，它包含服务器发送的欢迎消息；如果未发送任何消息，则为 。

span.span: A that contains the welcome message sent by the server; otherwise, if no message is sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果正在重新使用连接 ( 属性设置为`true`), 则属性将返回连接收到的第一个欢迎消息。If the connection is being reused (the property is set to `true`), the property returns the first welcome message received with the connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示此属性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclFtpClient#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CPP/ftptests.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[NclFtpClient#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLFtpClient/CS/ftptests.cs#13)]
